a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball II

p.k: The Colossus / The Fridge / The Remote / The Flower The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Penny's affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons' battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwin's pen.
